Buy Voices for the Cure to benefit the American Diabetes Association; get [...]

In which Keepsie makes a new friend, Clever Jack pulls in reinforcements, and we learn a little more about Barry’s power.

Episode recap by Shannon Farrell, Third Wave hero.

Promo: Morevi Remastered

Information about the John W. Campbell Award as well as the Hugo and Campbell ballot.

Buy Voices for the Cure to benefit the American Diabetes Association; get short stories from Cory Doctorow, Mike Resnick and an edited version of “Barry Koleman, Hero.”

In which Dr. Timson learns a little bit about Third Wave power, Peter loses something and we learn something private about Tattoo Devil.

Episode recap by Feedback from Who Wants To Be A Superhero? season 1.

Promo: Down The Road

Have you purchased your print version of Playing For Keeps? And call the Third Wave Hotline at 919 794 8498! And FOUR pint glasses are left! We are OUT of pint glasses!

A new player is introduced, we discover what the little device does, and there are robots. Meet the First Wave Volunteer, Paul Fischer. Episode recap by White Lightning. Promo: Disability 411 And Be sure to preorder your official Keepsie’s Bar pint glasses! $5.99 each! Don’t forget to [...]

In which our heroes reunite, make a decision, and immediately regret it. A new player is introduced, we discover what the little device does, and there are robots.

Meet the First Wave Volunteer, Paul Fischer.

Episode recap by White Lightning.

Promo: Disability 411

And Be sure to preorder your official Keepsie’s Bar pint glasses! $5.99 each!

Don’t forget to donate to Child’s Play, even if you don’t want to bid on the original Jared Axelrod artwork (Auction ends Thursday!)


The PDF will be up a little later than usual today, I appreciate your patience!

Promo: Disability 411 And Be sure to preorder your official Keepsie's Bar pint glasses! $5.99 each! Don't forget to donate to Child's Play, even if you don't want to bid on the original Jared Axelrod artwork (Auction ends Thursday!) The PDF will be up a little later than usual today, I appreciate your patience! In which our heroes get to see inside the Academy! Not that that’s a good thing…

Don’t forget the voicemail! 919 794 8498

Episode recap by Mister Adventure.

Promo: One Among the Sleepless

The pint glasses are ordered and available for pre-order! They are clear pint glasses with the black “Keepsie’s Bar” logo on them. They are $5.99 each. Order through PayPal! NOTE: They will not come to me for a couple of weeks, so if you order now, it will be some weeks before you receive them. I will announce – and post pictures – when they arrive.

The eBay auction is LIVE! Click here to bid! 100% of the money made from this auction goes to the Child’s Play charity, so please bid, or just check out Child’s Play and donate!

Please take a little time to give some love to the fabulous people who have helped me out in this fabulous venture. Check them in the Blogroll or the [...]

This is it! Episode One! In which we meet our hero and she meets a supervillain, and then several superheroes. Neither encounter is a very good one.

Please take a little time to give some love to the fabulous people who have helped me out in this fabulous venture. Check them in the Blogroll or the First Wave Volunteers page!

Intro by Dr. John Cmar.

Promo: Scott Sigler wants to kill you
